titles.title: Improving Access to Cardiac and Pulmonary Rehabilitation Act of 2017
Improving Access to Cardiac and Pulmonary Rehabilitation Act of 2017

A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to allow physician assistants, nurse practitioners, and clinical nurse specialists to supervise cardiac, intensive cardiac, and pulmonary rehabilitation programs.
Improving Access to Cardiac and Pulmonary Rehabilitation Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Improving Access to Cardiac and Pulmonary Rehabilitation Act of 2017
This bill amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to allow physician assistants, nurse practitioners, and clinical nurse specialists to supervise cardiac, intensive cardiac, and pulmonary rehabilitation programs.
